display_long_description:
**COLORBALL** is a high-energy mix of **Dodgeball** and **Bubble Shooter** — powered by archery, laser swords, boxing, and more. 
**A unique sport that can only exist in VR!**

## **YOUR MISSION**
Catch, throw, smash, shoot, punch, box, — do whatever it takes to hit balls of the **same color**. No rules. Just action. 
[media]

## **YOUR EQUIPMENT**
🏹 Bow and arrows  
⚔️ Laser swords  
🥊 Boxing gloves  
💫 Gravity bracelets  
⌚ A slow-motion watch  
🛡️ Shield and helmet  
✋ ...or just your bare hands  
[media]

## **YOUR CHALLENGE**
**Don't get hit** — not even once.  
Survive the chaos, master the flow, and conquer the arena!
[media]
